Filter.CheckBox_SearchFileID: Get File ID for Accurate Searching
Filter.TT_CheckBox_HideHardlinkedGroup: The group composed only of the symbolic link or the hard link to the same substance will be excluded from the result.
Filter.TT_CheckBox_SearchDataSegment: Ignore the metadata, and compare only data body. It corresponds to JPEG, PNG, MP3, WAV.
Filter.TT_CheckBox_SearchHiddenFile: Include the hidden folder and file for searching.
Filter.TT_CheckBox_SearchSubFolder: Include the sub folder for searching.

Renamer.Label_Rename_OverWriteMode: If a same name file exists

Setting.TT_CheckBox_ShowPictInToolTip: The image and the content of the text file are displayed in the tooltip of the result.
Setting.TT_CheckBox_IgnoreReadOnly: Ignore the read only attribute for deleting or moving.
Setting.TT_CheckBox_EnableSecondaryViewer: Enable the secondary viewer for comparing the images.
Setting.TT_CheckBox_ShowSizeInViewer: Show picture properties in the viewer.
Setting.CheckBox_EnableFolderContextMenuAutoSort: Enable Auto Sort of Folder Browsing
Setting.TT_Button_DetectDrives: Detect physical drives and network computers.
Setting.TextBlock_App: Please configure the full path of the application for cooperation.
Setting.Label_ExtPicture_Description: Extension of the file for treating as a picture.
Setting.CheckBox_Duplicates_CompareOnlySameFileN: Compare Only Same File Name Items
Setting.CheckBox_Similar_CompareOnlySameFileName: Compare Files That Has Same File Name
Setting.TT_CheckBox_Similar_CompareOnlySameAspec: Check the similarity of the pictures with same aspect ratio.
Setting.TT_CheckBox_Similar_CompareOnlySameSize: Check the similarity of the pictures with same width and same height.

Sorter.Label_RuleEdit_Mode: If a same name file exists
Sorter.TT_Button_ExportRule: Export Rules To A Text File.
Sorter.TT_Button_ImportRule: Import Rules From A Text File.

ToolBar.TT_Button_SearchType: Select search type or process type.
ToolBar.TT_Button_AutoCheck: Check the files for deletion by the pre-set rules.
ToolBar.TT_CheckBox_DeleteEmptyFolder: After file deletion, the empty folder will be deleted.
ToolBar.TT_CheckBox_UseRecycleBin: Use the recycle bin for file and folder deleting.

ContextMenu.CHECK_FOLDER_SUB_EXCEPT: Check Except Containing Folder (inc. Sub Folder)
ContextMenu.CHECK_FOLDERS_SUB_EXCEPT: Check Except Containing Folder (inc. Sub Folder)

DialogMessage.CANNOT_USE_CHARACTOR_FILE: Contains characters that cannot be used in the file name.___The following character cannot be used for the file name.___" < > | : * ? \ /______Also the following word cannot be used for the file name.___CON, PRN, AUX, NUL, COM0～9, LPT0～9
DialogMessage.CANNOT_USE_CHARACTOR_FOLDER: Contains characters that cannot be used in the folder name.___The following character cannot be used for the folder name.___" < > | : * ?
DialogMessage.INQUIRY_NOT_EXIST_FOLDER: is not found. Do you create it?
DialogMessage.CHECKED_ALL: Groups that all files are checked is existing.___Do you want to continue the deletion?
DialogMessage.SELECTED_ALL: Groups that all files are selected is existing.___Do you want to continue the deletion?
DialogMessage.NO_VALID_RENAME_RULE: Renaming option is enabled,___but valid rename rule is not selected.______Press 'Yes' button to start the folder watching without rename option.
DialogMessage.CONTAINTS_CONTINUOUS_RENAME_RULE: Rename rule that adds a continuous number is selected.___But cannot apply this rule during folder watching.______Press 'Yes' button to start the folder watching without rename option.
DialogMessage.WRITE_LANGUAGE_TITLE: Please select a language file to export.
DialogMessage.WARNING_AUTOCHECK_SHOWING_FILTERED_RESUL: Filtered result is showing.___Auto check function is performed on the search results that are not filtering.______Do you want to continue?
DialogMessage.WARNING_DELETE_SHOWING_FILTERED_RESULT: Filtered result is showing.___Delete function is performed on the search results that are not filtering.______Do you want to continue?
DialogMessage.WARNING_DELETE_CHECKED_FILES: Delete checked files.______Do you want to continue?

Item.DEFAULT_TEXT_FOLDER: Press '+' button, or drop files or folders here.
Item.DEFAULT_TEXT_WATCH_FOLDER: Press '+' button, or drop files or folders here.
Item.SORT_RULE_DEFAULT_DIRECTORY: Push '+' button or drop a folder or write down

ShortMessage.EXIST_SAME_FILENAME: The file of the same name exists.
ShortMessage.LOAD_CONFIG_BACKUP: Loading of a configuration file failed. The settings recovered from the backup file.
ShortMessage.LOAD_CONFIG_FAIL: Loading of a configuration file failed. All settings were initialized.
ShortMessage.LOAD_CONFIG_OLD: The configuration file for old version was loaded. Some settings were initialized.

Viewer.CANNOT_SHOW: Cannot show this file, The file may be broken, or be not picture file.
Viewer.CANNOT_SHOW_DIFFERENT_SIZE: Cannot show difference since picture size is different
Viewer.CANNOT_SHOW_NOT_SUPPORTED: This file format cannot be shown.
Viewer.CANNOT_OPEN_UNAUTORIZED: Cannot open file due to unauthorized access
Viewer.CANNOT_OPEN_IOERROR: Cannot open the file. Other processes might use the file.
Viewer.INSTRUCTION_CRITERIA_DUPLICATES: You can search duplicate files to the showing file in the viewer. If you want specify other criteria file, drop a file to the viewer.
Viewer.INSTRUCTION_CRITERIA_SIMILARITIES: You can search similar images to the showing file in the viewer. If you want specify other criteria file, drop a file to the viewer.
Viewer.INSTRUCTION_FILE_DROP_DUPLICATES: You can search duplicate files of criteria, To specify the criteria, drop a file in the viewer.
Viewer.INSTRUCTION_FILE_DROP_SIMILARITIES: You can search similar images of criteria, To specify the criteria, drop a immage file in the viewer.

Sc_Result.EDIT_LINK: グループのリンクを編集する

Sc_SearchType.SET_SEARCH_TYPE_DELETE_THUMBNAIL_CACHE: Change Mode to Delete Thumbnail Cache
Sc_SearchType.SET_SEARCH_TYPE_DUPLICATES: Change Mode to Search Duplicate Files
Sc_SearchType.SET_SEARCH_TYPE_DUPLICATES_SPECIFIED: Change Mode to Search Duplicate Files （Specified)
Sc_SearchType.SET_SEARCH_TYPE_SIMILARITIES: Change Mode to Search Similar Images
Sc_SearchType.SET_SEARCH_TYPE_SIMILARITIES_SPECIFIED: Change Mode to Search Similar Images (Specified)
Sc_SearchType.SET_SEARCH_TYPE_WATCH_DUPLICATES: Change Mode to Watch Duplicate Files
Sc_SearchType.SET_SEARCH_TYPE_WATCH_SIMILARITIES: Change Mode to Watch Similar Images
